assets.description: The native fee, governance and staking token of the Tinkernet Parachain.
assets.extended_description: Tinkernet is a Kusama parachain and the sister-chain of the InvArch Network on Polkadot. Tinkernet is an experimental proving ground where omnichain account & DAO governance protocols are deployed and tested before deploying on the InvArch Network. Protocols on Tinkernet realize features such as multichain multisig accounts & DAO Staking. Unlike a testnet, Tinkernet features real value.
assets.name: Tinkernet
